name: You
text: I've been sent to find the Yunion and bring peace to these lands

name: Townsman Bill
text: Thenk goodness! Wei're just frizeing to DETH upin these montains!

name: Townsman Bill
text: Evor sence the collaps of the Yunion, et's been FREEEZIN'

name: Townsman Bill
text: Aneways, glad to see a travler in these parts!

name: Townsman Bill
text: By de way! Down the well east of de Villeg lies the key to rech the Yunion!

name: Townsman Bill
text: Howevor! Yu need swimming gear, so here ya go! Borro mine!
